title: J Is Back, Beyonce, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: J Is Back, Beyonce, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Thursday show begins and Fool #2 is back!  What do you say to people with an ugly Easter outfit on?  Former senior advisor to Obama and best selling author Valerie Jarrett calls in.  Queen B drops a 40 track album.  We let you know what happens when Easter speeches go bad.  Sheryl Underwood talks about Obama, Biden and more.  Inside Miss Carla's Reality Update, there might be some Splitsville talk and more as she covers Real Housewives of Atlanta.  The Mueller Report will be available on Amazon.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about guilt and blame, plus so much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
